ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
RA: Was the eCap successfully turned on?
RA: Were Patient User Guide instructions and eCap Mistake Log given to participant?
Which medication was missed the most in the past week (as indicated by participant TRQ scores)?
Notes: 0= Not currently prescribed BD meds; 1= First; 2= Second; 3= Third; 4= Fourth; 5= Fifth; 6= Sixth; 7= Tie

ElementDescription: Which medicine is dosed most frequently?
Notes: 1= First; 2= Second; 3= Third; 4= Fourth; 5= Fifth; 6= Sixth; 7= Tie

ElementDescription: Which medicine was prescribed most recently?
Notes: 1= First; 2= Second; 3= Third; 4= Fourth; 5= Fifth; 6= Sixth; 7= Other

ElementDescription: Which medicine was prescribed most recently? Other bipolar maintenance medication, specify
Verify which BD medication will be in the eCap bottle:
Notes: 0= Not currently prescribed BD meds; 1= Abilify (Aripiprazole); 2= Clozaril (Clozapine); 3= Divalproex/Depakote (Valproate); 4= Fanapt (Iloperidone); 5= Gabapentin (Neurontin); 6= Geodeon (Ziprasidone); 7= Haldol (Haloperidol); 8= Invega (Paliperidone); 9= Lamictal (Lamotrigine); 10= Latuda (Lurasidone); 11= Lithium; 12= Loxitane (Loxapine); 13= Mellaril (Thioridazine); 14= Navane (Thiothixene); 15= Orap (Pimozide); 16= Risperdal (Risperidone); 17= Saphris (Asenapine); 18= Seroquel (Quetiapine); 19= Stedesa (Eslicarbazepine acetate); 20= Stelazine (Trifluoperazine); 21= Symbyax (Olanzapine and Fluoxetine combined); 22= Tegretol (Carbamazepine); 23= Thorazine (Chlorpromazine); 24= Topamax (Topiramate); 25= Trilafon (Perphenazine); 26= Trileptal (Oxcarbazepine); 27= Zyprexa (Olanzapine); 28= Other (Consult with the PI); 29= Permitil, Prolixin (Fluphenazine); 30= Pronol, InnoPran, Inderal (Propranolol); 31= Klonopin (Clonazepam); 32= Cariprazine (Vraylar); 33= Brexpiprazole (Rexulti)

ElementDescription: Verify which BD medication will be in the eCap bottle: Other, specify
How many times a day is the medication currently prescribed?
Notes: e.g., ''2'' if it is to be taken at breakfast and before bed

ElementDescription: What is the current dosage of each tablet?
What is the current total DAILY dosage prescribed?
Notes: e.g., ''30mg'' if prescription calls for 1 10mg tablet at breakfast and 2 10mg tablets before bed

ElementDescription: When are you due/scheduled to refill this BD medication?
Do you use pillminders (pill sorters, pill boxes, etc.) or other methods for managing your medication?
Method for managing your medication: Pillminder/Pill Sorter
Method for managing your medication: App
Method for managing your medication: Alarm
Method for managing your medication: Other
Method for managing your medication: Other, Specify
Have you been using the eCap since the previous visit?
If have not been using eCap since previous visit, explain why you have not been using the eCap:
Was the eCap scanned at visit?
Did the data from the eCap successfully download?
Has your provider changed since last visit?
Was the original medication in the eCap terminated?
Have there been any changes by your doctor to your prescription for this medication since your last assessment visit?
What was the date of the prescription change?
Were there any exceptions to the use of the eCap since the last assessment visit? Examples: took medication without opening eCap, opened eCap but did not take medication
How many times did the participant open the eCap without taking their medication within the past week?
How many times did the participant open the eCap without taking their medication within the past month?
How many days did the participant take all doses of their medication without opening the eCap within the past week?
How many days did the participant take all doses of their medication without opening the eCap within the past month?
How many times did the participant actually open the eCap in the past 7 days?
How many times did the participant actually open the eCap in the past 30 days?
How many times was the participant supposed to open the eCap in the past 7 days?
How many times was the participant supposed to open the eCap in the past 30 days?
eCap Past Week Percentage:
Notes: Times participant actually opened the eCap (eCap_actopenwk) divided by number of times participant was supposed to open the eCap (eCap_idealopenwk), multiplied by 100. Can exceed 100% when participants open the eCap more than they are supposed to.

ElementDescription: eCap Past Month Percentage:
Notes: Times participant actually opened the eCap (eCap_actopenmo) divided by number of times participant was supposed to open the eCap (eCap_idealopenmo), multiplied by 100. Can exceed 100% when participants open the eCap more than they are supposed to.

ElementDescription: How many DAYS did the participant miss a dose within the past 7 days? If dosed more than 1 time per day, missing even one dose counts as the full day is missed.
Notes: Number of days; 7= No meds taken

ElementDescription: Percentage adherence of days missed for the past week
Notes: Days missed in the past week (eCap_daysmissedwk) divided by 7 days, multiplied by 100

ElementDescription: Percentage adherence of days missed for the past week (including missed exceptions-i.e. they took their meds but did not open the eCap that day)
Notes: Days missed in the past week minus days participant took all doses without opening the eCap (eCap_daysmissedwk-eCap_excep_notopenwk) divided by 7 days, multiplied by 100

ElementDescription: How many DAYS did the participant miss a dose within the past 30 days? If dosed more than 1 time per day, missing even one dose counts as the full day is missed.
Percentage adherence of days missed for the past month
Notes: Days missed in the past month (eCap_daysmissedmo) divided by 30 days, multiplied by 100

ElementDescription: Percentage adherence of days missed for the past month (including missed exceptions-i.e. they took their meds but did not open the eCap that day)
Notes: Days missed in the past month minus days participant took all doses without opening the eCap (eCap_daysmissedmo-eCap_excep_notopenmo) divided by 30 days, multiplied by 100
